item.title: Mack Anthem blue interior v1.0 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 4, 2025

Mack Anthem blue interior v1.0 ATS

Mack Anthem blue interior
Changes the instruments and switches to blue,yellow,red,green and orange.
This mod is suitable for ATS Version 1.55.X.

Credits: Earl

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: DSL Map v1.4 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 4, 2025

DSL Map v1.4 ETS2

What’s new:
– 1 City reworked (Burriana)
– Landscape reworked between Burriana and Barros
– 1 New city added (Dam Valley)
– New background map added
– Ambientsounds added (reworked parts only)
– bug fixed

About the map:
The DSL Map is fictional and does not exist in real life. The map is scaled at 1:3.

INSTALLATION:
1. Extract or open the DSL Map v1.4.rar with WinRAR
2. Put the 4 SCS files into your mod folder
3. Start your game and create a new Profile
4. Go to the mod manager and activate the 4 files
(DSL Map.scs Model 1.scs and Model 2.scs)
5. Start the new profile

If you have already played the DSL Map before, delete the old 3 files and replace them with the 4 new files in the mod folder
(You can use your old DSL Map mod profile.)
THE ORDER OF THE 4 FILES DOESN’T MATTER!!

IMPORTANT!!
– There is one more file to activate (Model3)
– This map is based on a completely new map, and it is not compatible with any other map mod (Pro Mods…)
– You need all SCS map DLCs except the Greece DLC
Works in 1.55**

Credits: Black Dragon

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: REAL AI COUNTRY SPAWNS ADD-ON for Jazzycat v21.8.7 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 4, 2025

REAL AI COUNTRY SPAWNS ADD-ON for Jazzycat v21.8.7 ETS2

NEWS:
– This update features cool improvement – with SGD’s consent, I’ve replaced Jazzy’s Peugeot 206 GTI and VW Golf 4 R32 with SGD’s stock regular versions. This way update brings even more realism to the traffic, as Golf R32 is something very rare to meet in traffic. Thanks you SGD!
– This update also fixes errors with dangling pointers with SCS police vehicles that appeared in 1.55.
– Finally and hopefully fixed spawns in Kazakhstan.
– Fixed some vehicles without UK interior spawning in right-hand-countries.

This add-on sets all cars to REAL SPAWNS BY COUNTRY they appear in. Every country has custom setting of all cars spawning, according to the real traffic and car brands popularity. Spawns follow also country’s wealth, which means no more luxury cars on every corner in less wealthy countries like Romania or Macedonia for example. I studied those countries using sells statistics and dashcam videos from most countries, this is actually result of several years of work and contant improving. I had this for my private use, but I decided to share it publicly now.

Add-on also fixes spawning of cars in left-drive countries, like United Kingdom or Ireland, with wrong-positioned steering wheel and driver – by disallowing cars that don’t have model for these countries. There is an exception for vans with UK skins, which would be missing on UK roads otherwise.

Countries with spawns set are all SCS countries. Add-on also supports and set spawns for these map mods: Promods, Promods Middle-East, Promods Great Steppe, Road to Asia and Road To Africa (by Terramaps), Java Road Revolution map (= Indonesia map), Maghreb map mod (North part of Africa), Heart of Africa and Horn of Africa maps.

This add-on also includes lots of fixes and new features:
Wheel changes, real colours and generic colour palette, my own car trailer, car trailers variety, disable bad models of cars from traffic, texture fixes etc. For more details check my thread on SCS forum!
This version is only compatible with Jazzycat’s AI traffic pack v21.8.7 for ETS2 version 1.55.
You need to download Jazzycat’s AI traffic pack in order to work! Place my add-on ABOVE the Jazzycats’s AI pack in the mod manager!

Enjoy realistic traffic.

Credits: Egon, Jazzycat, SCS, SGD

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
